prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just checking in to see how you’re doing today.  
Don’t forget about our meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. Looking forward to it!  
Your package has been shipped and should arrive by Thursday.  
Hi Mom, I’ll be over for dinner around 6! What can I bring?  
Just a reminder that your subscription will renew on the 5th.  
Your OTP for account verification is 123456.  
Can you send me the notes from yesterday’s meeting? I missed a few points.  
Hey! Let’s grab coffee next week. What day works for you?  
Just wanted to let you know I’m thinking of you. Hope all is well!  
Your bank statement is ready to view. Log in to check it out.  
The event starts at 7 PM. Don’t forget to bring your ticket!  
I’ll be late to the party, stuck in traffic. Sorry!  
Congratulations! You’ve been selected for the community service award.  
Please confirm your attendance for the team-building event next Friday.  
Thanks for your help with the project! I really appreciate it.  
Your appointment for the dentist is confirmed for next Wednesday at 3 PM.  
Hey, can you pick up some groceries on your way home? Thanks!  
The weather looks great for our hike this weekend!  
Just a quick reminder: your car service is due next month.  
I hope your presentation went well today! Can’t wait to hear about it.  
Your flight has been delayed by an hour. Please check for updates.  
Can you send me your address again? I misplaced it.  
I’m so proud of you for finishing your course! Let’s celebrate soon!  
Your delivery has been scheduled for tomorrow between 2-4 PM.  
The movie starts at 8 PM. Let’s meet at the theater by 7:30!  
Please review the attached document and provide your feedback by Friday.  
I really enjoyed our chat last night. Let’s do it again soon!  
Your package has been delivered! Check your porch.  
I’m running errands today; do you need anything?  
Your feedback is important to us. Please take a moment to fill out the survey.  
I’ll be out of the office next week but available by email if needed.  
Thanks for the reminder about the book club meeting!  
Your account balance is low. Please deposit funds to avoid fees.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the family reunion next month!  
Can we reschedule our lunch to next Wednesday?  
Your prescription is ready for pickup at the pharmacy.  
Just checking in to see if you received my last message.  
Excited for the concert this weekend! Do you have the tickets?  
I hope you have a great trip! Safe travels!  
The server maintenance will occur from 2 AM to 4 AM tonight.  
I’m here if you want to talk about what’s been bothering you.  
Your order has been processed successfully. Thank you for shopping with us!  
I’m available for a call tomorrow afternoon if that works for you.  
Congratulations on your promotion! Let’s celebrate!  
Your RSVP for the wedding is due by the end of the week.  
I appreciate your prompt response to my email. Thank you!  
I just wanted to remind you about the deadline for submitting your report.  
Hope you’re having a wonderful day! Just wanted to say hi!  
Your feedback on our service is appreciated; here’s a link to the survey.  
Looking forward to our game night this Friday!  
The meeting has been moved to the larger conference room.  
I’m so glad we reconnected! Let’s keep in touch more often.  
Your online order is out for delivery and should arrive shortly.
